```js
$ npm install mocha
```

```js
$ node_modules/.bin/mocha test.js
```

```js
.
```

```js
.test B

  ✔ 2 tests complete (6ms)
```

```js
test A

test B
.

```

```js
  before A
before A.1
beforeEach A
beforeEach A.1
A.1.1
.afterEach A.1
afterEach A
beforeEach A
beforeEach A.1
A.1.2
.afterEach A.1
afterEach A
after A.1
after A

  ✔ 4 tests complete (16ms)
```
